eventCategoryPage.query: query MyQuery { eventCategoryPage { id created createdby { id } lastchange name nameEn valid } }

eventGroupPage.query: query MyQuery { eventGroupPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } eventId group { id } groupId id lastchange event { id } } }

eventPage.query: query MyQuery { eventPage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } enddate eventType { id name } eventtypeId id lastchange mastereventId name nameEn presences { id eventId } startdate valid } }

eventTypePage.query: query MyQuery { eventTypePage { category { id } categoryId changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn valid } }

invitationTypePage.query: query MyQuery { invitationTypePage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn valid } }

presencePage.query: query MyQuery { presencePage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } event { id name } eventId id invitationType { id name } invitationtypeId lastchange presenceType { id name } presencetypeId userId user { id } } }

presenceTypePage.query: query MyQuery { presenceTypePage { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn valid } }

eventById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { eventById(id: $id) { created createdby { id } enddate eventType { id } eventtypeId id lastchange mastereventId name nameEn presences { id } startdate valid } }

eventCategoryById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { eventCategoryById(id: $id) { created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn valid } }

eventGroupById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { eventGroupById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created createdby { id } event { id } eventId group { id } groupId id lastchange } }

eventTypeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { eventTypeById(id: $id) { categoryId changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name nameEn valid } }

invitationTypeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { invitationTypeById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange name valid nameEn } }

presenceById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { presenceById(id: $id) { created changedby { id } createdby { id } eventId event { id name } id invitationType { id name } invitationtypeId lastchange presenceType { name id } presencetypeId userId user { id } } }

presenceTypeById.query: query MyQuery($id: UUID!) { presenceTypeById(id: $id) { changedby { id } created createdby { id } id lastchange nameEn name valid } }

eventCategoryInsert.query: mutation MyMutation($data: EventCategoryInsertGQLModel!) { eventCategoryInsert(eventCategory: $data) { category { id name } id msg } }
mutation MyMutation($data: EventCategoryInsertGQLModel!) { eventCategoryInsert(eventCategory: $data) { category { id name } id msg } }
